qas.question: Who was the Arena Football League's 2014 broadcast partner?
What app were Arena Football League games broadcast on in 2014?
Along with the ESPN networks, on what network were 2014 AFL games broadcast?
On what channel could one watch ArenaBowl XXVII live?

context: Starting in 2014, <a0_0><a3_0>ESPN<a3_0/><a0_0/> returned to the AFL as broadcast partners, with weekly games being shown on <a2_0>CBS Sports Network<a2_0/>, ESPN, ESPN2, ESPNEWS along with all games being broadcast on ESPN3 for free live on <a1_0>WatchESPN<a1_0/>. ArenaBowl XXVII was also broadcast on ESPN. Most teams also have a local TV station broadcast their games locally and all games are available on local radio.
